title: How a Hasidic Wedding in the UAE Went Viral on Instagram
description: Levi Duchman and Lea Hadad brought together a diverse swath of guests for an unusual event: a large Hasidic wedding in the United Arab Emirates.
dc:creator: Valeriya Safronova
media:description: Levi Duchman and Lea Hadad, who were married on Sept. 14 at the Hilton Abu Dhabi Yas Island, had a guest list of more than 1,500 people including prominent members of the Emirati community. Such religious and cultural diversity is “not typical” for a Hasidic wedding, Rabbi Duchman said.
